biotools.summary: Norwegian e-Infrastructure for Life Sciences enables Norwegian life scientists and their international collaborators to store, share, archive, and analyse their omics-scale data. NeLS is developed by ELIXIR Norway and funded by the Research Council of Norway. It can be accessed via a web application, web API, and SSH. Online analysis of data is enabled by integrated instances of Galaxy, including a set of pre-defined workflows.
